subject: AI & Agents
title: AlphaCode: AI That Competes in Programming
description: A micro-lesson that makes AlphaCode: AI That Competes in Programming usable.

hook.text: An AI enters a competitive programming contest with thousands of human coders. It ranks in the top 54%.

buildup.text: DeepMind's AlphaCode generates millions of candidate solutions, then filters and clusters them.

discovery.text: It reasons about problems, handles edge cases, and implements algorithms from natural language descriptions.

twist.text: Top competitive programmers are safe â€” AlphaCode solves easy to medium problems, not the hardest ones.

climax.text: AlphaCode showed that AI can reason about code, not just autocomplete it.

punchline.text: It can't beat the best coders. But it's better than most. That's the point.

quiz.question: Where did AlphaCode rank among human competitive programmers?
options: In the top 54%, solving easy to medium problems
It won first place in every contest
It couldn't solve any competitive problems
